html:
May 26 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Antofagasta, Danone and Flutter Entertainment, on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Antofagasta ANTO.L: Peel Hunt raises to hold from reduce

* Boliden AB BOL.ST: Deutsche Bank raises to hold from sell

* Danone DANO.PA: Berenberg cuts to sell from hold

* Flutter Entertainment Plc FLTRF.L: HSBC raises to hold from reduce

* MusicMagpie Plc MMAG.L: Peel Hunt initiates with buy rating and 233p target price

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* Abivax SA ABVX.PA: Kepler Cheuvreux raises target price to EUR 55 from EUR 40

* Admiral ADML.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 2,430p from 2,120p

* Ageas SA AGES.BR: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 60.57 from EUR 55.87

* Alpha Financial Markets Consulting Plc AFM.L: Berenberg raises PT to 420p from 310p

* Antofagasta ANTO.L: Deutsche Bank raises target price to 1350p from 1150p

* Antofagasta ANTO.L: Peel Hunt cuts target price to 1,520p from 1,615p

* Antofagasta ANTO.L: Peel Hunt raises to hold from reduce
